title: Object Classification
description: An informal classification of the type of objects within the ObjectGroup, using a hierarchical structure. This class is used to categorise the ObjectGroup according to an informal, self-referential hierarchy. For example, this can be used to create a hierarchy encompassing biological, geological and anthropological collections, where a single formal taxonomy isn't appropriate.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasObjectClassification
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ObjectClassification class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: objectClassificationLevel
properties.description: The level of the ObjectClassification in the hierarchy.

properties.name: objectClassificationName
properties.description: A short title describing this ObjectClassification as a class, unit or grouping.
